collections.description_title: This collection was born out of a deeply personal story.
collections.description: It began with a painting I created for a friend who was walking through a very painful divorce. After over a year of separation and ongoing legal battles, he asked me to create something for his soon-to-be ex-wife, a gift of encouragement, a symbol of hope. The painting was meant to remind them both that no matter the hurt of the past or the unknown future, God can redeem what feels broken beyond repair. Three months after receiving their painting and, after both friends surrendered their brokenness to Jesus, I received a text message I'll never forget: "Your painting is in hanging in the center of OUR home." God restored their marriage! The painting now hangs in their living room with their initials on each side and has become a symbol of the restoration God brought to their family. What a God of restoration we serve!!!

collections.title: Raising Arrows
collections.description:
“Legacy isn’t leaving something for your kids, it’s about leaving something IN them.” If you’ve been looking for a painting that honors your family and tells a story, you’ve come to the right place!  Read what the families below have to say about their custom Raising Arrow paintings!

Start Your Family Legacy Painting Today!

paintings.title: Demario and Tamela Davis Arrows 36 X 60

collections.title: Custom Fingerprints
collections.description_title: “God gave you a fingerprint that no one else has so you can leave an imprint no one else can”

collections.title: Mended Series
collections.description:
“Without brokenness there is no need for grace. Without grace, there is only brokenness.” - Brit Albin Art

The Mended Series is based on the Japanese philosophy of Kintsugi - The art of mending something broken with gold. They say because something is broken, it has a story, and that story makes it beautiful. Our faith is often tried in seasons of brokenness but God says through sufficient trial, we will come forth as precious and as pure as gold. Refinement is necessary. (Job 23:10) 

Each Mended painting is a sweet reminder that God’s grace still mends, brings hope to, and transform broken places.

Give him all your “broken” and with it, he will make a masterpiece.

collections.title: Identity Collection
collections.description: Our fingerprints don’t fade from the lives we touch. Whether you are celebrating the life and legacy of a loved one, celebrating your marriage covenant or Anniversary, or you are teaching your children how unique they are to this world, we can create a custom fingerprint painting that captures their unique identity within their fingerprint!
